doc.str: SMALL-SCALE ELECTRICAL UNIT, ESPECIALLY A TOOTHBRUSH

The invention relates to a small-scale electrical unit for personal use, especially a toothbrush, comprising an electronic module, especially a drive, a switch for switching the electrical component on and off, and a battery compartment for receiving a battery or an accumulator for supplying energy to the electrical component. The inventive electrical unit is provided with an automatic switching device which forces said switch into its switching-on position when the battery is inserted into the battery compartment. The drive or the corresponding electrical component is immediately actuated, independently of the initial position of the switch, such that, before the battery compartment is closed, it can be immediately established whether the battery has been successfully inserted. According to the invention, the switching device is embodied in such a way that the switch is only actuated when the battery is inserted with the correct polarity.
